subject: Lying
author: Jill
full_text:
I found an interesting page about W.B. Yeats, who apparently had written quite a lot about the afterlife I think via automatic writing.  Anywho, the article details the different stages one goes through after death, and there's a lot that, if true, would explain some of what we've experienced or suspected via our boxes:

http://www.yeatsvision.com/After.html
